page.title: 08ENTERTAINMENT(1)
page.content: As our area is entirely rural -virtually all farmland and farms!- entertainment is hard to find.Thus reference will be made to some of the entertainment which goes on in the villages bordering our square. The{"Hampshire Chronicle"}of July 19th 1985 reports on the activities of the Womens Institutes at Easton and Itchen Abbas/Avington.The former had just visited Selborne and Mottisfont Abbey and the latter enjoyed a talk on 'pottery'. The youngsters of the area have often complained of having nothing to do in the evenings.The formation of the "{Itchen River Rats"} was a response to this sort of complaint. An all night sponsored Pool Marathon to raise money.
